articles.author: Cristina Gallardo, Emilio Casalicchio
articles.title: World leaders scramble for invites to 'a funeral like no other' - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: US President Biden, Japanese Emperor Naruhito and New Zealand Prime Minister Ardern will be among the guests for Queen Elizabeth II’s state funeral on September 19.
articles.content: LONDON  As Britain mourns the death of its longest-serving monarch, frantic preparations are already underway in London for what is shaping up to be one of the centurys biggest diplomatic occasions.… [+8444 chars]
